page.title: 16Village Children's Homes
page.content: MARY WARD aged 8 My house is at the bottom of a hill, it is in Bradford near Witchampton. We are no.1, Bradford Farm Cottages My next door neighbour is no.3. My house is 140 years old. Some of the house is 150 years old I think it is made of brick with rendering on the walls. There is a porch with honeysuckle on the wall. It has 5 windows at the front, it has slates on the roof and 2 chimneys made of brick. We are surrounded with big fields and trees. My house is semi_detached and it is white. KIMBERLEY MAYO aged 7 My house is detached it is made of stone my house used to be a police house and it is very old. Out of my bedroom window I can see the school and an old thatched house. We have tomatoes in the garden and a porch.
